mapper.select: select op.product_id, op.order_id, o.member_no, o.orderdate, o.order_status_cd, op.price, op.amount, op.order_status_cd, cd.value, im.filename, p.name from tbl_orderproduct op join tbl_order o on op.order_id = o.order_id join (select code, value from tbl_code where codetype='ORDER_STATUS')cd on op.order_status_cd = cd.code left outer join (select product_id, min(filename)as filename from tbl_image group by product_id )im on op.product_id = im.product_id join (select name, product_id from tbl_product)p on op.product_id = p.product_id where o.order_id = #{order_id}

select op.orderproduct_id, op.product_id, op.order_id, o.member_no, o.orderdate, op.order_status_cd, op.price, op.amount, cd.value, im.filename, p.name from tbl_orderproduct op join tbl_order o on op.order_id = o.order_id join (select code, value from tbl_code where codetype='ORDER_STATUS')cd on op.order_status_cd = cd.code left outer join (select product_id, min(filename)as filename from tbl_image group by product_id )im on op.product_id = im.product_id join (select name, product_id from tbl_product)p on op.product_id = p.product_id where o.member_no = #{member_no} ORDER BY op.orderproduct_id DESC
mapper.update: update tbl_orderproduct set order_status_cd = #{order_status_cd} where orderproduct_id = #{orderproduct_id} and member_no = #{member_no}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_changeandrefund(changeandrefund_id,orderproduct_id, candrdate, reasoncode, textreason, order_status_cd, member_no) values (seq_changeandrefund_id.nextval,#{orderproduct_id},sysdate,#{reasoncode}, #{textreason, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{order_status_cd},#{member_no})
